Layout & Breakpoints

Container widths and the 12‑column grid.

12‑Col Grid (Desktop)
4 cols
8 cols
12 cols
Responsive Example
A
B
C
Container roles
Widths
  • sm: 640px
  • md: 768px
  • lg: 1024px
  • xl: 1280px
  • 2xl: 1536px
Gutters & grid
  • Page gutters: px-4 (mobile), wider on desktop
  • Grid: 12 columns, gap-3 (12px)
  • Cards avoid nested borders; use single boundary

Motion

Durations and easing tokens.

Tokens
--ph-global-motion-fast = 120ms
--ph-global-motion-base = 150ms
--ph-global-motion-slow = 240ms
--ph-global-motion-ease = cubic-bezier(.2,.8,.2,1)
Canonical transitions
/* Hover/press */
transition: all var(--ph-global-motion-base) var(--ph-global-motion-ease);

/* Enter/exit */
opacity: 0; transform: translateY(4px);
transition: opacity var(--ph-global-motion-base) var(--ph-global-motion-ease),
            transform var(--ph-global-motion-base) var(--ph-global-motion-ease);

/* Tooltip fade (timing only) */
transition: opacity var(--ph-global-motion-fast) var(--ph-global-motion-ease);

Data‑Viz

Brand vs baseline.

Series palette
Strategy & baseline
Recharts theme (static snippet)
// Line/Area only
<Line dataKey="vault" stroke="var(--ph-global-color-brand)" />
<Line dataKey="hodl" stroke="rgb(100 116 139)" /> {/* slate-500 */}
<CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" opacity={0.4} />
<Tooltip /> // concise labels
Do: line/area only; limit series; neutral baselines. Don't: pies, 3D, rainbow palettes, low-contrast tints.

Tooltip (static specimen)
/* Timing */
transition: opacity var(--ph-global-motion-fast) var(--ph-global-motion-ease);
/* Content */
font-size: 12px; padding: 8px 12px; border-radius: 8px;
/* Colors */
background: white; border: 1px solid var(--ph-semantic-color-border); color: var(--ph-semantic-color-textSecondary);

Patterns — Forms

Two‑column layout, validation placement, concise helper text.

Two‑column form
Validation

Use 3–32 lowercase letters, numbers, or dashes.

Numbers only; currency symbol allowed.

Guidance: keep error text to one sentence; place beneath the field. Don't stack multiple errors per field.

Neutral confirmation

Destructive confirmation
Delete strategy? This cannot be undone.

Guidance: toolbars use concise chips and a single row of controls. Avoid multiple stacked rows; collapse to a drawer on small screens.

Governance

Versioning, contribution rules, and deprecations.

Versioning
  • Minor: new components/props; no breaking changes.
  • Patch: bug fixes, docs copy updates.
  • Major: breaking tokens/props or removed components. Provide a migration note.
Deprecation policy
  • Mark deprecated in docs with a badge and removal target.
  • Keep for ≥1 minor release with a migration path.
  • Remove in the next major, note in CHANGELOG.
PR checklist
  • Uses semantic tokens; no raw hex; spacing ∈ {4,8,12,16,24,32}
  • Only shadow-pharos or shadow-pharos-sm; single borders
  • Focus visible on all interactive elements
  • Docs specimen is static (no popovers); includes state grid where applicable
  • Snapshots updated (npm run test:update) and reviewed
  • CHANGELOG entry added

Theme — Dark Mode

Token-first overrides via :root.dark and .ph-dark.

Light

Surface, border, and text use light tokens.

Dark

Surface, border, and text use dark tokens.

Theme — Brand Aliases

Swap brand via CSS variable overrides without touching components.

Default theme

Components use Tailwind brand mapped to alias tokens.

Slate theme (scoped)

Scoped override via .ph-theme-slate.

Iconography

Sizes 16/20/24 • stroke 1.5 • color inherits text.

Sizes
Allowed sizes: 16, 20 (default), 24
Stroke
Default stroke: 1.5
Color (inherits)
Icons use currentColor via text utilities.
Accessibility: if an icon is informative, set aria-label. If decorative, set aria-hidden.
